publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-03 10:07:26 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains issue of Today Tufts. It was the predecessor to the Tufts Daily,and was a student-run newspaper of Tufts University. Today Tufts began on September 20, 1977 and ceased publication in 1979. Each volume covers one academic year. The issues are undated and have been dated by the archives staff. The archives holds one copy of each Today Tufts issue.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Responsibility for new student orientation once fell under the pervue of the Orientation Committee. Currently, the Office for Campus Life takes a leadership role in the planning and implementation of New Student Orientation.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains issues of Today Tufts, the predecessor to the Tufts Daily. It was a student-run newspaper of Tufts University. Today Tufts began on September 20, 1977 and ceased publication in 1979.
